remarks: Rearrangement of 4 terms in a vector sum.  (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-2007.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
vccom.1 $e |- G = ( 1st ` W ) $.
vccom.2 $e |- X = ran G $.
vca4 $p |- ( ( W e. CVecOLD /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X ) /\ ( C e. X /\ D e. X ) ) -> ( ( A G B ) G ( C G D ) ) = ( ( A G C ) G ( B G D ) ) ) $.
